title: Saturday Special – Colin Speaks with Kirk Goldsberry
itunes:title: Saturday Special – Colin Speaks with Kirk Goldsberry
description:
Colin talks with former Spurs VP of strategic research, Author and NBA Analyst Kirk Goldsberry about the NBA changing to such a perimeter oriented game.  They also discuss what positions are becoming even more irrelevant and what changes Colin would like to see made to the NBA in this exclusive podcast.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
